channel.title: Recipes on Learn Buffalo
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Learn Buffalo

item.title: JavaScript Doesn't Have to Be Hard: htmx Integration
item.description: The htmx library is JavaScript made easy, providing out-of-the-box interactions with Buffalo or any web app

item.title: Integrate VueJS
item.description: Add VueJS components to your Buffalo site for interactive and dynamic pages

item.title: Connect to Mongodb
item.description: Connect to a Mongo DB instance for your data model needs, replacing the default Pop plugin

item.title: Integrate Search
item.description: Push content into a search index with Buffalo events, and allow users to find content by search.
